Department of Theoretical Physics, Kaliningrad State University,

\begin{abstract}
The compatible expansion in series of solutions of both the equations of
P--Q pair at neighborhood of the singular point is obtained in closed form for
regular and irregular singularities.
The conservation laws of the system of ordinary differential equations to
arise from the compatibility condition of the P--Q pair are derived.
\end{abstract}
\maketitle

author: N V Ustinov
